definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: And almost everyone disliked Muslims and Buddhists more than any other group.
sentences.chinese: 而穆斯林和佛教徒幾乎是衆矢之的，沒人待見。

sentences.english: Among evolutionary biologists, this idea is contested.
sentences.chinese: 這個觀點並不受進化生物學家待見。

sentences.english: He will assume that the customer does not like him.
sentences.chinese: 他會認爲這個客戶不待見自己。

sentences.english: But this does not mean that we do not get along.
sentences.chinese: 但是這並不意味哦我們彼此就不待見對方。

sentences.english: He was generally disliked and regarded as a pompous ass .
sentences.chinese: 他常不招人待見，而且被看作是個自負的大傻帽兒。

sentences.english: It was also the age at which people would start to look askance at the office.
sentences.chinese: 而且，人到了這個年齡，在職場上也開始不受待見了。
